message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit your business. Considering its value to us and the market, I propose a price of $950000 for this exclusive opportunity.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $875000 for it.
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am proposing a price of $900000 for the product.
I understand your position, Alice. I am still interested in your product, and I am willing to pay $887500 for it.
I appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer you the product at a price of $895000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $890000 for the product.
Considering your latest offer, I am delighted to offer the product to you at a price of $892500, Bob.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I am willing to pay $890000 for the product.
After reviewing your offer once more, I am pleased to offer the product to you at a price of $891250, Bob.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I am willing to pay $890000 for the product.
